<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7786|שׂוּר]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7787|שׂוּר]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7795|שׂוֹרָה]]</big>**</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרָה‎</span> **verb** ==persist, exert oneself, persevere== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***persist, persevere***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתאֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Hos.12.4|Hos 12:4]] ***he persevered with God***; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעִם אֲנָשִׁים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִיתָ עִםאֿ‎</span> [[Gen.32.29|Gen 32:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). — [[Hos.12.5|Hos 12:5]] has ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫שַׂר‎</span> in same meaning, as if from a (non-existent) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּר‎</span>; &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּ֫שֶׂר‎</span> (apocope from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׂרֶה‎</span>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺרָה‎</span> [[Isa.28.25|Isa 28:25]] see above.
